body: There is an Issue for gMSA. @kvprasoon Did you investigations for this?

> There is an Issue for gMSA. @kvprasoon Did you investigations for this?

I saw it and will go through it.
@PaulHigin can you re-review?  Looks like @kvprasoon addressed your concerns

@kvprasoon for validation, you can use the CIM cmdlets to call the WMI instance method Win32_Service.GetSecurityDescriptor() to verify the SD was changed correctly.  I believe there's an existing test that creates a test service so you can reuse that code.
@PaulHigin Thanks, I have created #8872 for `Get-Service` . I will have the changes done for the review comments in upcoming weekends.

> @kvprasoon for validation, you can use the CIM cmdlets to call the WMI instance method Win32_Service.GetSecurityDescriptor() to verify the SD was changed correctly.  I believe there's an existing test that creates a test service so you can reuse that code.


`GetSecurityDescriptor()` method returns a returnvalue, hence I though using `SC SDSHOW`  as it will give the exact output which can be compared with the input.

Hi @PaulHigin , I have updated with required changes and unit tests and CI has failed, seems like not related to this commit.

Doc changes: https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs/pull/3880 

Cc: @SteveL-MSFT
@PoshChan 	Please get test failures
@TravisEz13, all requests start with the magic word `Please`.
@PoshChan Please get test failures
@TravisEz13, did not find any test failures or test failures were not published to results
@TravisEz13, did not find any test failures or test failures were not published to results
@TravisEz13, did not find any test failures or test failures were not published to results

@TravisEz13, your last commit had 3 failures in `PowerShell-CI-windows`
### Set/New/Remove-Service cmdlet tests.Set-Service test cases on the services with dependent relationship.Set-Service can stop a service with dependency
  Error: Expected exactly 'Running', but got Stopped.
```stacktrace
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Set-Service.Tests.ps1: line 374
374:             (Get-Service $testservicename1).Status | Should -BeExactly "Running"
```
### Set/New/Remove-Service cmdlet tests.Set-Service test cases on the services with dependent relationship.Set-Service cannot stop a service with running dependent service
  Error: Expected exactly 'Running', but got Stopped.
```stacktrace
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Set-Service.Tests.ps1: line 374
374:             (Get-Service $testservicename1).Status | Should -BeExactly "Running"
```
### Set/New/Remove-Service cmdlet tests.Set-Service test cases on the services with dependent relationship.Set-Service can stop a service with running dependent service by parameter -Force
  Error: Expected exactly 'Running', but got Stopped.
```stacktrace
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Set-Service.Tests.ps1: line 374
374:             (Get-Service $testservicename1).Status | Should -BeExactly "Running"
```
@PoshChan please get test failures
@TravisEz13, test results were not published for PowerShell-CI-linux at vstfs:///Build/Build/19649
@TravisEz13, test results were not published for PowerShell-CI-macos at vstfs:///Build/Build/19648
@TravisEz13, test results were not published for PowerShell-CI-static-analysis at vstfs:///Build/Build/19650

@TravisEz13, your last commit had 2 failures in `PowerShell-CI-windows`
Set/New/Remove-Service cmdlet tests.Set-Service can change credentials of a service
```powershell
Expected a value, but got $null or empty.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Set-Service.Tests.ps1: line 183
183:             $service | Should -Not -BeNullOrEmpty
```
Set/New/Remove-Service cmdlet tests.Get-Service can get the 'UserName' of a service
```powershell
Expected a value, but got $null or empty.
at <ScriptBlock>, D:\a\1\s\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Management\Set-Service.Tests.ps1: line 304
304:             $service | Should -Not -BeNullOrEmpty
```

Hope there is nothing pending from my side here.

Cc @SteveL-MSFT @TravisEz13  @PaulHigin @daxian-dbw @adityapatwardhan
@PoshChan Please rerun windows
@PoshChan Please remind me in 1 hour
@TravisEz13, this is the reminder you requested 1 hour ago
CI fails as no 7.x endpoints available, issue https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9999
@PoshChan Please remind me in 1 hour
@TravisEz13, this is the reminder you requested 1 hour ago
